definition: to go out somewhere (relatively short trip)/to set off on a journey (longer trip)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
remitting bank
Didi Chuxing Technology Co., aka DiDi, app-based transportation company, headquartered in Beijing, founded in 2012

sentences.english: Hop a fast train and sit back - Cupid will be waiting for you when you get to your destination.
sentences.chinese: 乘上火車出行吧，丘比特在終點等待你呢。

sentences.english: I prefer subway over private car.
sentences.chinese: 我坐地鐵，不開私車出行。

sentences.english: Travel conditions have certainly improved since 1911.
sentences.chinese: 1911年後，出行條件得到了很大的改善。

sentences.english: Blind sidewalk is an important component for the blind people to go out in their daily life.
sentences.chinese: 盲道是輔助盲人日常生活中出行的城建設施之一。

sentences.english: Roads account for 90% of all passenger journeys made in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 公路交通佔英國人出行比重的90%。

sentences.english: Xu Leizhi in the changing shape, each trip has a different outfit.
sentences.chinese: 徐雷智在劇中造型多變，每次出行都有不同的行頭。

sentences.english: You need to re-confirm that leg of your journey forty-eight hours before you travel.
sentences.chinese: 您要在出行前48小時再確認一下行程。

sentences.english: If travel is unavoidable, the Shenzhen bus network on your side.
sentences.chinese: 如果出行在所難免，深圳巴士網在您身邊。

sentences.english: Although I travelled solo, I was never alone.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我獨自出行，但從未感到過孤獨。

sentences.english: Overexertion on hot summer days can lead to heat-related injuries.
sentences.chinese: 夏季出行中過度運動，可能導致與發熱有關的傷害。

sentences.english: Avoid traveling when the weather service has issued advisories.
sentences.chinese: 氣象服務發佈警告時要避免出行。

sentences.english: I have a good quiet, so I travel by bus has become the only transportation vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 我好靜，於是公車便成了我出行的唯一交通載體。

sentences.english: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentences.chinese: 這次出行是爲了能駛入冰雪覆蓋的峽灣。

sentences.english: She was ticketed for misdemeanor driving with a suspended license.
sentences.chinese: 她因明知吊銷執照而繼續駕車出行而再次被檢方起訴。

sentences.english: But what is it like riding this subterranean dragon?
sentences.chinese: 然而，乘坐地下巨龍出行的感受到底如何呢？

sentences.english: The position of the east village vanke county is very good, the journey is convenient.
sentences.chinese: 萬科東郡小區的位置很好，出行方便。
